engChrName: It's a three-day weekend, so as long as we're only staying the one night, I can join you.
engSearchText:
It's a three-day weekend, so as long as we're only
staying the one night, I can join you.
jpnChrName: ──今回も三連休なので 私も一泊だけなら大丈夫です。
jpnSearchText:
──今回も三連休なので
私も一泊だけなら大丈夫です。

engChrName: You mean it? I'm so happy you get to come!
engSearchText: You mean it? I'm so happy you get to come!
jpnChrName: ！　えへへ…… よろしくお願いします、アニエスさん！
jpnSearchText:
！　えへへ……
よろしくお願いします、アニエスさん！

engChrName: I'm happy you get to come, too, Feri.
engSearchText: I'm happy you get to come, too, Feri.
jpnChrName: ええ、フェリちゃんこそ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、フェリちゃんこそ。

engChrName: HELLO? Are you two even listening to me?
engSearchText: HELLO? Are you two even listening to me?
jpnChrName: ってオイ……！ 少しは人の話を聞きやがれ。
jpnSearchText:
ってオイ……！
少しは人の話を聞きやがれ。

engChrName: We know from the get-go that Almata's involved this time.
engSearchText:
We know from the get-go that Almata's involved
this time.
jpnChrName: 今回は《アルマータ》が 端っからはっきり関わってやがる。
jpnSearchText:
今回は《アルマータ》が
端っからはっきり関わってやがる。

engChrName: And my gut's tellin' me this is gonna be real trouble, so I want you two to stay parked right he—
engSearchText:
And my gut's tellin' me this is gonna be real trouble,
so I want you two to stay parked right he—
jpnChrName: 俺のカンだが相当ヤバい。 お前らは２日ほど留守番を──
jpnSearchText:
俺のカンだが相当ヤバい。
お前らは２日ほど留守番を──

engChrName: That's exactly why I want to come and protect you!
engSearchText: That's exactly why I want to come and protect you!
jpnChrName: だからこそです……！ ヴァンさんの護衛のためにも！
jpnSearchText:
だからこそです……！
ヴァンさんの護衛のためにも！

engChrName: I want to know what the people who did that to Aida are after, too.
engSearchText:
I want to know what the people who did that to Aida
are after, too.
jpnChrName: それに……アイーダさんの仇の “彼ら”の狙いを知るためにも。
jpnSearchText:
それに……アイーダさんの仇の
“彼ら”の狙いを知るためにも。

engChrName: And with all I know about what's going on, I don't want to be the only one sitting around in the capital.
engSearchText:
And with all I know about what's going on, I don't
want to be the only one sitting around in the capital.
jpnChrName: ……私も聞いてしまった以上、 自分だけ首都になんて居られません。
jpnSearchText:
……私も聞いてしまった以上、
自分だけ首都になんて居られません。

engChrName: Besides...
engSearchText: Besides...
jpnChrName: それに……
jpnSearchText: それに……

engChrName: ...as long as the Geneses might be involved, this is my problem as much as it is yours.
engSearchText:
...as long as the Geneses might be involved, this is
my problem as much as it is yours.
jpnChrName: 《ゲネシス》が関わっているなら 私自身の問題でもあると思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
《ゲネシス》が関わっているなら
私自身の問題でもあると思うんです。

engChrName: I'll start packing my things as soon as I get back to my dorm—so please, take me with you!
engSearchText:
I'll start packing my things as soon as I get back to my
dorm—so please, take me with you!
jpnChrName: 寮に帰ったらすぐに荷造りをします。 どうか連れて行ってください……！
jpnSearchText:
寮に帰ったらすぐに荷造りをします。
どうか連れて行ってください……！

engChrName: Man, a big-ass bracer like you can't just stand around here and not expect to get stares...
engSearchText:
Man, a big-ass bracer like you can't just stand around
here and not expect to get stares...
jpnChrName: ……おいおい。 ガタイと肩書を考えろよ。
jpnSearchText:
……おいおい。
ガタイと肩書を考えろよ。

engChrName: Hey there. Sorry for calling you on such short notice.
engSearchText: Hey there. Sorry for calling you on such short notice.
jpnChrName: よう、来たか。 いきなり呼び出して済まんな。
jpnSearchText:
よう、来たか。
いきなり呼び出して済まんな。

engChrName: How'd you manage to convince the others to let you go?
engSearchText:
How'd you manage to convince the others to let
you go?
jpnChrName: 若いのにはどう説明してきたんだ？
jpnSearchText: 若いのにはどう説明してきたんだ？

engChrName: Don't worry about it. I lost 'em anyways.
engSearchText: Don't worry about it. I lost 'em anyways.
jpnChrName: あー、何とか誤魔化して振り切った。
jpnSearchText: あー、何とか誤魔化して振り切った。

engChrName: But think you could give me more of a heads up next time? Those kids'll poke their nose into anything once they catch a whiff.
engSearchText:
But think you could give me more of a heads up
next time? Those kids'll poke their nose into anything
once they catch a whiff.
jpnChrName: こういう連絡は事前に頼むぜ。 好奇心の強いガキが多いんだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
こういう連絡は事前に頼むぜ。
好奇心の強いガキが多いんだからよ。

engChrName: Hahaha! Sure thing. Next time.
engSearchText: Hahaha! Sure thing. Next time.
jpnChrName: ワハハ、そんじゃ次からはな。
jpnSearchText: ワハハ、そんじゃ次からはな。

engChrName: *sigh*
engSearchText: *sigh*
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: So, what do you even want from me?
engSearchText: So, what do you even want from me?
jpnChrName: ──で、結局何の用事なんだ。
jpnSearchText: ──で、結局何の用事なんだ。

engChrName: If you just wanted someone to help you blend in, wouldn't Elaine or Claussell've done the job just fine?
engSearchText:
If you just wanted someone to help you blend in,
wouldn't Elaine or Claussell've done the job just fine?
jpnChrName: カモフラ程度ならエレインや クラウゼルでも事足りるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
カモフラ程度ならエレインや
クラウゼルでも事足りるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: They're tough enough to serve as backup, but they'd probably make me stand out more than you think.
engSearchText:
They're tough enough to serve as backup, but they'd
probably make me stand out more than you think.
jpnChrName: あいつらの腕なら心配はねぇが 逆の意味で目立っちまいそうでなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あいつらの腕なら心配はねぇが
逆の意味で目立っちまいそうでなぁ。

engChrName: 'Sides, I think you're a better fit with who we're about to meet.
engSearchText:
'Sides, I think you're a better fit with who we're about
to meet.
jpnChrName: それに──これから会うヤツの事を考えると お前さんの方が都合が良さそうだからな。
jpnSearchText:
それに──これから会うヤツの事を考えると
お前さんの方が都合が良さそうだからな。

engChrName: Oh, come ON...
engSearchText: Oh, come ON...
jpnChrName: ……おいおい、まさか……
jpnSearchText: ……おいおい、まさか……

engChrName: Hey, I'll buy you a drink for the trouble. Anyway, let's get going.
engSearchText:
Hey, I'll buy you a drink for the trouble. Anyway, let's
get going.
jpnChrName: ハハ、一杯奢るからよ。 とにかく入るとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、一杯奢るからよ。
とにかく入るとしようぜ。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnChrName: あら……
jpnSearchText: あら……

engChrName: Huh? That is...you, isn't it, Judith? Did you dye your hair?
engSearchText:
Huh? That is...you, isn't it, Judith? Did you dye
your hair?
jpnChrName: あれ……先輩、ですよね？ どうしてそんな格好を──
jpnSearchText:
あれ……先輩、ですよね？
どうしてそんな格好を──

engChrName: (Judith! You're still in disguise!)
engSearchText: (Judith! You're still in disguise!)
jpnChrName: （ジュディスさん、変装……！）
jpnSearchText: （ジュディスさん、変装……！）

engChrName: N-Nope, nothing like that! See? I was just trying out a new wig, that's all.
engSearchText:
N-Nope, nothing like that! See? I was just trying out
a new wig, that's all.
jpnChrName: い、いや～、ちょっと 新作のウィッグを試してたところでね！
jpnSearchText:
い、いや～、ちょっと
新作のウィッグを試してたところでね！

engChrName: What's up, Nina? I did tell you I won't be back for a while, didn't I?
engSearchText:
What's up, Nina? I did tell you I won't be back for a
while, didn't I?
jpnChrName: ──どうしたの、ニナ、 しばらく戻れないって言ったでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
──どうしたの、ニナ、
しばらく戻れないって言ったでしょ？

engChrName: You did, but Mr. Gotti insisted that I get in touch with you right away.
engSearchText:
You did, but Mr. Gotti insisted that I get in touch
with you right away.
jpnChrName: その、ゴッチ監督から至急連絡を 取りたいと頼まれてしまいまして。
jpnSearchText:
その、ゴッチ監督から至急連絡を
取りたいと頼まれてしまいまして。

engChrName: He's pushing the whole film industry to release a statement and make a donation in response to Creil.
engSearchText:
He's pushing the whole film industry to release a
statement and make a donation in response to Creil.
jpnChrName: ……クレイユ村の一件、映画界としても 共同声明や寄付金で動きたいらしいんです。
jpnSearchText:
……クレイユ村の一件、映画界としても
共同声明や寄付金で動きたいらしいんです。

engChrName: ...I see.
engSearchText: ...I see.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどね。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどね。

engChrName: I'm a little tied up, so I can't do anything right this second, I'm afraid... Can I call you back tonight?
engSearchText:
I'm a little tied up, so I can't do anything right this
second, I'm afraid... Can I call you back tonight?
jpnChrName: ちょっと立て込んで今は動けないけど…… 今夜また連絡するわ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと立て込んで今は動けないけど……
今夜また連絡するわ。

engChrName: Of course. Take care and talk to you later, then.
engSearchText: Of course. Take care and talk to you later, then.
jpnChrName: 分かりました、お気を付けて。
jpnSearchText: 分かりました、お気を付けて。

engChrName: You, too. Thanks.
engSearchText: You, too. Thanks.
jpnChrName: ええ、また夜で。
jpnSearchText: ええ、また夜で。

engChrName: That's a big surprise coming from the director...
engSearchText: That's a big surprise coming from the director...
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督が……
jpnSearchText: ゴッチ監督が……

engChrName: Doesn't feel like him, but maybe he's the type to take action when shit hits the fan.
engSearchText:
Doesn't feel like him, but maybe he's the type to take
action when shit hits the fan.
jpnChrName: ハッ、らしくねえような…… いや意外と率先してやりそうか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、らしくねえような……
いや意外と率先してやりそうか。

engChrName: Indeed. He strikes me as not only a passionate man, but a compassionate one as well.
engSearchText:
Indeed. He strikes me as not only a passionate man,
but a compassionate one as well.
jpnChrName: ええ、“情熱”だけでなく “情”にも篤い方のようでしたし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、“情熱”だけでなく
“情”にも篤い方のようでしたし。

engChrName: Haha. For sure.
engSearchText: Haha. For sure.
jpnChrName: ハハ……そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ……そうだな。

engChrName: Well, I'm with him. I'm not going to let this tragedy stand—not as someone in the film industry or as a thief.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm with him. I'm not going to let this tragedy
stand—not as someone in the film industry or as
a thief.
jpnChrName: ──あたし自身、業界人としても “怪盗”としても見過ごせないわ。
jpnSearchText:
──あたし自身、業界人としても
“怪盗”としても見過ごせないわ。

engChrName: We're absolutely going to take Almata down for this, but we have to know what we're up against if we're going to protect all we can!
engSearchText:
We're absolutely going to take Almata down for this,
but we have to know what we're up against if we're
going to protect all we can!
jpnChrName: まずは手の届くところをカバーしながら “危機”の輪郭を見極めるわよ……！
jpnSearchText:
まずは手の届くところをカバーしながら
“危機”の輪郭を見極めるわよ……！

engChrName: Exactly!
engSearchText: Exactly!
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: I couldn't agree more.
engSearchText: I couldn't agree more.
jpnChrName: うん……本当にそうだね。
jpnSearchText: うん……本当にそうだね。

engChrName: There they are!
engSearchText: There they are!
jpnChrName: いたか……！
jpnSearchText: いたか……！

engChrName: And there's our demon sphere.
engSearchText: And there's our demon sphere.
jpnChrName: あれが件の“魔球”のようだね！
jpnSearchText: あれが件の“魔球”のようだね！

engChrName: And as we suspected, there's the demon sphere.
engSearchText: And as we suspected, there's the demon sphere.
jpnChrName: やはり“魔球”はここか……！
jpnSearchText: やはり“魔球”はここか……！

engChrName: And right there is our demon sphere!
engSearchText: And right there is our demon sphere!
jpnChrName: フフ、例の“魔球”ですね……！
jpnSearchText: フフ、例の“魔球”ですね……！

engChrName: I'll keep them at bay, Fie!
engSearchText: I'll keep them at bay, Fie!
jpnChrName: フィーさん、ここは わたしが押さえますっ……！
jpnSearchText:
フィーさん、ここは
わたしが押さえますっ……！

engChrName: While I'm doing that—
engSearchText: While I'm doing that—
jpnChrName: その隙にどうか──！
jpnSearchText: その隙にどうか──！

engChrName: Back up a bit. You're better when it comes to forcing your way through enemies. Leave disrupting them to me.
engSearchText:
Back up a bit. You're better when it comes to forcing
your way through enemies. Leave disrupting them
to me.
jpnChrName: ううん、突破力はそっちが上。 攪乱はわたしに任せて。
jpnSearchText:
ううん、突破力はそっちが上。
攪乱はわたしに任せて。

engChrName: If we can keep that sphere in check, that should make life easier for everyone!
engSearchText:
If we can keep that sphere in check, that should make
life easier for everyone!
jpnChrName: あの“魔球”さえ押さえれば もう少しマシになるはず……！
jpnSearchText:
あの“魔球”さえ押さえれば
もう少しマシになるはず……！

jpnChrName: くっ……
jpnSearchText: くっ……

engChrName: This might've been a mistake. If only we had three— even two more people...
engSearchText:
This might've been a mistake. If only we had three—
even two more people...
jpnChrName: マズったかも…… あと３人、いや２人いれば──
jpnSearchText:
マズったかも……
あと３人、いや２人いれば──

engChrName: Ferida! Claussell!
engSearchText: Ferida! Claussell!
jpnChrName: フェリーダ、クラウゼルも！
jpnSearchText: フェリーダ、クラウゼルも！

engChrName: Van!
engSearchText: Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……！

engChrName: Van! Aaron! Risette!
engSearchText: Van! Aaron! Risette!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！ アーロンさんにリゼットさんも！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん……！
アーロンさんにリゼットさんも！

engChrName: Van! Aaron!
engSearchText: Van! Aaron!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……アーロンさんも！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……アーロンさんも！

engChrName: Van! Risette!
engSearchText: Van! Risette!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……リゼットさんも！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……リゼットさんも！

engChrName: Don't get cocky and start running on ahead, kiddos.
engSearchText: Don't get cocky and start running on ahead, kiddos.
jpnChrName: ハッ、チビ同士が イキって先走ってんじゃねえよ！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、チビ同士が
イキって先走ってんじゃねえよ！

engChrName: We are so glad that you're both all right.
engSearchText: We are so glad that you're both all right.
jpnChrName: ご無事で何よりです！ フェリ様、フィー様も！
jpnSearchText:
ご無事で何よりです！
フェリ様、フィー様も！

engChrName: Didn't expect Ikaruga's second-in-command to be with you.
engSearchText:
Didn't expect Ikaruga's second-in-command to be
with you.
jpnChrName: 《斑鳩》の副長まで……
jpnSearchText: 《斑鳩》の副長まで……

engChrName: Heya, Sylphid. Good to see you again.
engSearchText: Heya, Sylphid. Good to see you again.
jpnChrName: やあ妖精。 オラシオンで会って以来かな？
jpnSearchText:
やあ妖精。
オラシオンで会って以来かな？

engChrName: Sure didn't expect the CID's aide to be with you.
engSearchText: Sure didn't expect the CID's aide to be with you.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの補佐官まで……
jpnSearchText: ＣＩＤの補佐官まで……

engChrName: We do run into one another in the strangest of places, now, don't we?
engSearchText:
We do run into one another in the strangest of places,
now, don't we?
jpnChrName: フッ、お互い妙な所で会うものだ。
jpnSearchText: フッ、お互い妙な所で会うものだ。

engChrName: Didn't expect Heiyue's White Orchid Dragon to be with you.
engSearchText:
Didn't expect Heiyue's White Orchid Dragon to be
with you.
jpnChrName: 黒月の白蘭竜（はくらんりゅう）まで……
jpnSearchText: 黒月の白蘭竜（はくらんりゅう）まで……

engChrName: Heh. How lovely it is see you again, Fie.
engSearchText: Heh. How lovely it is see you again, Fie.
jpnChrName: フフ、フィーさん。 先日の打ち上げ以来ですね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、フィーさん。
先日の打ち上げ以来ですね。

engChrName: The talking can wait. We gotta take these down first!
engSearchText: The talking can wait. We gotta take these down first!
jpnChrName: 話は後だ── コイツらをまとめてブチ倒す。
jpnSearchText:
話は後だ──
コイツらをまとめてブチ倒す。

engChrName: We're countin' on you for backup, Claussell.
engSearchText: We're countin' on you for backup, Claussell.
jpnChrName: クラウゼルもよろしく頼むぞ！
jpnSearchText: クラウゼルもよろしく頼むぞ！

engChrName: I'm ready!
engSearchText: I'm ready!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）っ……！
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）っ……！

engChrName: The same to you. Let's kick some butt!
engSearchText: The same to you. Let's kick some butt!
jpnChrName: こちらの台詞──行くよ！
jpnSearchText: こちらの台詞──行くよ！

engChrName: Whew... Glad that's over.
engSearchText: Whew... Glad that's over.
jpnChrName: ふう…… 何とかなったみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
何とかなったみてぇだな。

engChrName: Looks like we severed the connection between the sphere and the devils.
engSearchText:
Looks like we severed the connection between the
sphere and the devils.
jpnChrName: 魔球からの“力”も 断ち切れたみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
魔球からの“力”も
断ち切れたみたいだね。

engChrName: Indeed. That sphere will no longer supply power.
engSearchText: Indeed. That sphere will no longer supply power.
jpnChrName: ああ、魔球からの“力”も 断たれただろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、魔球からの“力”も
断たれただろう。

engChrName: I believe that sphere will supply power no longer.
engSearchText: I believe that sphere will supply power no longer.
jpnChrName: 魔球からの“力”も 無事、祓えたようです。
jpnSearchText:
魔球からの“力”も
無事、祓えたようです。

engChrName: So our theory was right on the money, then.
engSearchText: So our theory was right on the money, then.
jpnChrName: ん、やっぱり 睨んだ通りだったかな。
jpnSearchText:
ん、やっぱり
睨んだ通りだったかな。

engChrName: Van!
engSearchText: Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん──！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん──！

engChrName: E-Easy, now...
engSearchText: E-Easy, now...
jpnChrName: お、おいおい。
jpnSearchText: お、おいおい。

engChrName: *sniffle* I'm so happy to see you again...
engSearchText: *sniffle* I'm so happy to see you again...
jpnChrName: うううっ…… よかった、また会えてっ……
jpnSearchText:
うううっ……
よかった、また会えてっ……

engChrName: Everything just happened so suddenly that I...I...
engSearchText: Everything just happened so suddenly that I...I...
jpnChrName: あんな事がいきなり起こって わたしっ……わたしっ……
jpnSearchText:
あんな事がいきなり起こって
わたしっ……わたしっ……

engChrName: Man...
engSearchText: Man...
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: About time you showed your kid side.
engSearchText: About time you showed your kid side.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、お子ちゃまは お子ちゃまってところか。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、お子ちゃまは
お子ちゃまってところか。

engChrName: I'm so glad that you're unharmed.
engSearchText: I'm so glad that you're unharmed.

リゼットさんもですっ！

engSearchText: Argh! Knocked the wind right outta me...

engChrName: Heehee. It's good to see you again.
engSearchText: Heehee. It's good to see you again.

jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
早めに会えて良かったです。

engChrName: Good grief...
engSearchText: Good grief...

Well, I'd say we're done here. Let's get back to

I'd say our work here is done. We should return to
the bistro.

jpnSearchText:
ここの元凶も撃破したし

engSearchText:
I think our work here is done. Why don't we return to
the bistro?

jpnSearchText:
ここの元凶も下しましたし
いったんビストロに戻りましょうか。

engChrName: The next train should be here any minute...
engSearchText: The next train should be here any minute...
jpnChrName: もう少しで次の列車が到着するな……
jpnSearchText: もう少しで次の列車が到着するな……

engChrName: Somethin' up, buddy? That sure was a heavy sigh.
engSearchText: Somethin' up, buddy? That sure was a heavy sigh.
jpnChrName: よう、オッサン。 辛気臭い顔してどうした？
jpnSearchText:
よう、オッサン。
辛気臭い顔してどうした？

engChrName: Might be a bit if you're waitin' for the train. Sure you wanna stand that long?
engSearchText:
Might be a bit if you're waitin' for the train. Sure you
wanna stand that long?

jpnSearchText:
次の列車はもう少し先だぜ。
座って待たなくていいのかよ。

engChrName: Hey, you can talk to me. I already know your plan, anyways.
engSearchText:
Hey, you can talk to me. I already know your
plan, anyways.

jpnSearchText:
ハハ、んな邪険にすんなよ。
アンタは回送列車を待ってんだろ？

engChrName: You're gonna jump in front of the train and put yourself out of your misery, right?
engSearchText:
You're gonna jump in front of the train and put
yourself out of your misery, right?
jpnChrName: で、そいつで手っ取り早く楽になりてえ訳だ。
jpnSearchText: で、そいつで手っ取り早く楽になりてえ訳だ。

engChrName: ...Who are you?
engSearchText: ...Who are you?
jpnChrName: ……何なんだ、アンタ？
jpnSearchText: ……何なんだ、アンタ？

engChrName: Just some guy who was asked by a stall owner in Riverside to deliver somethin'.
engSearchText:
Just some guy who was asked by a stall owner in
Riverside to deliver somethin'.
jpnChrName: リバーサイドの屋台の店主に頼まれたんだよ。 アンタの忘れ物を届けてほしいってな。
jpnSearchText:
リバーサイドの屋台の店主に頼まれたんだよ。
アンタの忘れ物を届けてほしいってな。

engChrName: You forgot your cake bag there.
engSearchText: You forgot your cake bag there.
jpnChrName: ケーキの箱、忘れて行っただろ？
jpnSearchText: ケーキの箱、忘れて行っただろ？

engChrName: ...Oh. So that's where I left it.
engSearchText: ...Oh. So that's where I left it.
jpnChrName: ああ……あの屋台に置き忘れてたのか。
jpnSearchText: ああ……あの屋台に置き忘れてたのか。

engChrName: I'd planned to use that to end it all after enjoying a few drinks and some music...
engSearchText:
I'd planned to use that to end it all after enjoying a
few drinks and some music...
jpnChrName: 酒と演奏でいい気分になった後に、 そいつで一発やろうと思ってたんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
酒と演奏でいい気分になった後に、
そいつで一発やろうと思ってたんだがな。

engChrName: ...but by the end, I got so drunk I forgot all about it.
engSearchText: ...but by the end, I got so drunk I forgot all about it.
jpnChrName: 酒が回り過ぎちまったのか、 肝心なのを忘れちまってたみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
酒が回り過ぎちまったのか、
肝心なのを忘れちまってたみたいだな。

engChrName: Lucky for you, I'm here to give it back.
engSearchText: Lucky for you, I'm here to give it back.
jpnChrName: それじゃコイツはアンタに返すぜ。
jpnSearchText: それじゃコイツはアンタに返すぜ。

engChrName: Before I do, though, I'm curious—what made you wanna resort to that to begin with?
engSearchText:
Before I do, though, I'm curious—what made you
wanna resort to that to begin with?
jpnChrName: だがその前に……ひとつ聞かせてくれねえか？ どうして楽になりてえんだ。
jpnSearchText:
だがその前に……ひとつ聞かせてくれねえか？
どうして楽になりてえんだ。

engChrName: I suppose you're gonna try to change my mind, huh?
engSearchText: I suppose you're gonna try to change my mind, huh?
jpnChrName: ハッ……俺を引き留めようってのか？
jpnSearchText: ハッ……俺を引き留めようってのか？

engChrName: Nah. Not plannin' to butt into your business. Just wanna know, is all.
engSearchText:
Nah. Not plannin' to butt into your business.
Just wanna know, is all.
jpnChrName: いや、どうするもアンタの勝手だと思うぜ？ ただの興味ってだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、どうするもアンタの勝手だと思うぜ？
ただの興味ってだけだ。

engChrName: Almost feels like you're treating this like some kinda entertainment.
engSearchText:
Almost feels like you're treating this like some
kinda entertainment.
jpnChrName: 興味ねえ……見世物みたいに思われるのも 気分が悪いんだが。
jpnSearchText:
興味ねえ……見世物みたいに思われるのも
気分が悪いんだが。

engChrName: Sorry, don't take it the wrong way. You've got a lot more life experience than me, so I was thinkin' something like this'd be useful to know.
engSearchText:
Sorry, don't take it the wrong way. You've got a lot
more life experience than me, so I was thinkin'
something like this'd be useful to know.
jpnChrName: 見世物だとは思っちゃいねえが、 人生の先輩の考えを今後の参考にしたくてね。
jpnSearchText:
見世物だとは思っちゃいねえが、
人生の先輩の考えを今後の参考にしたくてね。

engChrName: Pfft. Yeah, sure.
engSearchText: Pfft. Yeah, sure.
jpnChrName: ハッ……なんだそれは。 変わったヤツだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……なんだそれは。
変わったヤツだな。

engChrName: Sorry, but I can't imagine anything I can say will be of any use to you.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but I can't imagine anything I can say will be of
any use to you.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら、人生の先輩として アンタに大した事は教えられねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
残念ながら、人生の先輩として
アンタに大した事は教えられねえよ。

engChrName: You can find stories like mine around every corner.
engSearchText: You can find stories like mine around every corner.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、なんつうか……どこにでもある話さ。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、なんつうか……どこにでもある話さ。

engChrName: I lost my job—all because my new superior at work really had it in for me.
engSearchText:
I lost my job—all because my new superior at work
really had it in for me.
jpnChrName: 新しい上司に嫌われて、 長年勤めた会社を退職させられたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
新しい上司に嫌われて、
長年勤めた会社を退職させられたんだ。

engChrName: Any idea why?
engSearchText: Any idea why?
jpnChrName: それまたどうして？
jpnSearchText: それまたどうして？

engChrName: I couldn't tell you why he hated me so much—just that he did.
engSearchText:
I couldn't tell you why he hated me so much—just
that he did.
jpnChrName: どこで嫌われたかは知らないが……
jpnSearchText: どこで嫌われたかは知らないが……

engChrName: I started getting blamed for anything and everything. Didn't matter whether it was my fault or not. In the end, even my own workers lost faith in me.
engSearchText:
I started getting blamed for anything and everything.
Didn't matter whether it was my fault or not. In the
end, even my own workers lost faith in me.
jpnChrName: ある事無い事、ソイツから難癖を付けられてな。 信じてた部下にも見放されちまった。
jpnSearchText:
ある事無い事、ソイツから難癖を付けられてな。
信じてた部下にも見放されちまった。

engChrName: I worked so hard to build up my place in the company—to get my coworkers' trust. I had everything up through my retirement worked out.
engSearchText:
I worked so hard to build up my place in the
company—to get my coworkers' trust. I had
everything up through my retirement worked out.
jpnChrName: コツコツ信頼と地位を築き上げて、 定年退職まで頑張るつもりでいたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
コツコツ信頼と地位を築き上げて、
定年退職まで頑張るつもりでいたんだが……

engChrName: Decades of hard work and planning, all gone in a flash. Life lost all meaning afterwards.
engSearchText:
Decades of hard work and planning, all gone in
a flash. Life lost all meaning afterwards.
jpnChrName: 崩れ落ちる時は一瞬だった。 ……もう全部どうでもいいやと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
崩れ落ちる時は一瞬だった。
……もう全部どうでもいいやと思ってな。

engChrName: I guess that had to have hit pretty hard.
engSearchText: I guess that had to have hit pretty hard.
jpnChrName: なんつうか、そいつは無念だろうな。
jpnSearchText: なんつうか、そいつは無念だろうな。

engChrName: That's putting it lightly. My job was basically all I had. I'm still single, and I don't have any hobbies or skills.
engSearchText:
That's putting it lightly. My job was basically all
I had. I'm still single, and I don't have any hobbies
or skills.

jpnSearchText:
ああ、この歳で独身で、趣味も特技も何もない。
仕事の為だけに生きて来たってのに……

engChrName: I can't help but wonder where I went wrong. Did I do something to piss off Aidios...?
engSearchText:
I can't help but wonder where I went wrong. Did I do
something to piss off Aidios...?

jpnSearchText:
どうしてこんな事になっちまったんだ……
俺の人生はどこから間違えちまったんだ……

engChrName: (Hmm... I know I told him I wouldn't butt in...)
engSearchText: (Hmm... I know I told him I wouldn't butt in...)
jpnChrName: （さて……どうしたもんかね。）
jpnSearchText: （さて……どうしたもんかね。）

engChrName: (...but the client trusted me with him.)
engSearchText: (...but the client trusted me with him.)
jpnChrName: （依頼主からは、コイツの事を頼むって   言われちまってるからな。）
jpnSearchText:
（依頼主からは、コイツの事を頼むって
言われちまってるからな。）

engChrName: (That means I've gotta at least try to change his mind.)

(That means I've gotta at least try to change
his mind.)

jpnSearchText:
（どうにかして
思い留まらせないといけねえ訳だが。）

engChrName: (Looks like I might have a bit of room to do that, luckily.)

(Looks like I might have a bit of room to do
that, luckily.)
jpnChrName: （今までの話を聞いた限りだと   諦めさせる余地は十分ありそうだ……）
jpnSearchText:
（今までの話を聞いた限りだと
諦めさせる余地は十分ありそうだ……）

(So the question is: should I try to convince him the
old-fashioned way? Or give him the cold shoulder
and see how he reacts to that?)

jpnSearchText:
（真っ当に説得するか、
あえて突き放してみるか……）

engChrName: (One of those'll hopefully work.)
engSearchText: (One of those'll hopefully work.)
jpnChrName: （どうやってこのオッサンを説き伏せる……？）
jpnSearchText: （どうやってこのオッサンを説き伏せる……？）

engChrName: (Let's try the old-fashioned approach.)
engSearchText: (Let's try the old-fashioned approach.)
jpnChrName: （ここは真っ当に説得してみるか……）
jpnSearchText: （ここは真っ当に説得してみるか……）

engChrName: Let me get this straight...
engSearchText: Let me get this straight...
jpnChrName: おいオッサン、もう一度聞くが……
jpnSearchText: おいオッサン、もう一度聞くが……

engChrName: You got fired because this superior of yours blamed you for stuff you didn't do, right?
engSearchText:
You got fired because this superior of yours blamed
you for stuff you didn't do, right?
jpnChrName: あることないこと難癖を付けられて 会社を辞めさせられたと言ってたよな。
jpnSearchText:
あることないこと難癖を付けられて
会社を辞めさせられたと言ってたよな。

engChrName: That's right. What of it?
engSearchText: That's right. What of it?
jpnChrName: ああ、そうだが……？
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうだが……？

engChrName: There's your way out of this, then. Sue his ass.
engSearchText: There's your way out of this, then. Sue his ass.
jpnChrName: それならまだ逆転のチャンスがあるぜ。 ──その上司を訴えるんだ。

それならまだ逆転のチャンスがあるぜ。
──その上司を訴えるんだ。

engChrName: Hah. Don't make me laugh.
engSearchText: Hah. Don't make me laugh.
jpnChrName: ハッ、何を言ってるんだか……
jpnSearchText: ハッ、何を言ってるんだか……

engChrName: You really think he'd leave evidence lying around that'd incriminate him? No way the company wouldn't cover it all up.
engSearchText:
You really think he'd leave evidence lying around
that'd incriminate him? No way the company
wouldn't cover it all up.

jpnSearchText:
どうせ上司や会社に不利な証拠は
もみ消されちまってる。

engChrName: It'd be next to impossible to beat them in court.
engSearchText: It'd be next to impossible to beat them in court.
jpnChrName: そんな状況で訴えた所で、 俺が割を食うだけだろ。
jpnSearchText:
そんな状況で訴えた所で、
俺が割を食うだけだろ。

engChrName: Without me, you mean.
engSearchText: Without me, you mean.
jpnChrName: 安心しな、そこを何とかするのが俺の仕事だ。
jpnSearchText: 安心しな、そこを何とかするのが俺の仕事だ。

engChrName: Van handed the man his business card.
engSearchText: Van handed the man his business card.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはスーツの男性に名刺を渡した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンはスーツの男性に名刺を渡した。

engChrName: I'm a spriggan from Arkride Solutions. I take on jobs you can't bring to the police or the guild.
engSearchText:
I'm a spriggan from Arkride Solutions. I take on jobs
you can't bring to the police or the guild.
jpnChrName: 俺は《アークライド解決事務所》── 《裏解決屋》をやってるモンでな。
jpnSearchText:
俺は《アークライド解決事務所》──
《裏解決屋》をやってるモンでな。

engChrName: This is a bit outside my usual scope, but I'm feelin' generous, so I'll make an exception.
engSearchText:
This is a bit outside my usual scope, but I'm feelin'
generous, so I'll make an exception.
jpnChrName: こういう手合いの仕事は滅多に受けねえが、 これも何かの縁だ、引き受けてやってもいいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
こういう手合いの仕事は滅多に受けねえが、
これも何かの縁だ、引き受けてやってもいいぜ。

engChrName: I'll get you whatever evidence you need to win in trial—guaranteed.
engSearchText:
I'll get you whatever evidence you need to win in
trial—guaranteed.
jpnChrName: どんな手を使ってでも 裁判に勝てる証拠を捻り出してやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
どんな手を使ってでも
裁判に勝てる証拠を捻り出してやるよ。

engChrName: Oh, I get it. So you're the spriggan I've heard so much about.
engSearchText:
Oh, I get it. So you're the spriggan I've heard so
much about.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋……噂で聞いた事があるな。 アンタがそれだっていうのか。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋……噂で聞いた事があるな。
アンタがそれだっていうのか。

engChrName: It's hard to believe you can pull off the miracle I'd need for this, but...
engSearchText:
It's hard to believe you can pull off the miracle I'd
need for this, but...
jpnChrName: 信じられないが、それがもし本当なら……
jpnSearchText: 信じられないが、それがもし本当なら……

engChrName: ...Never mind. I'd rather not try my luck.
engSearchText: ...Never mind. I'd rather not try my luck.
jpnChrName: ……いや、やっぱりそれは止めておこう。
jpnSearchText: ……いや、やっぱりそれは止めておこう。

engChrName: How come? This is my job, so as long as you pay, I'll make sure it's done right.
engSearchText:
How come? This is my job, so as long as you pay, I'll
make sure it's done right.
jpnChrName: それまたどうして？ 遠慮はいらねえぞ、金（ミラ）はきっちり貰うからな。
jpnSearchText:
それまたどうして？
遠慮はいらねえぞ、金（ミラ）はきっちり貰うからな。

engChrName: Haha. Nah, that's not it. I just remembered how exhausting it was to work there. It was like I had to stress about every little detail.
engSearchText:
Haha. Nah, that's not it. I just remembered how
exhausting it was to work there. It was like I had to
stress about every little detail.
jpnChrName: はは……よく考えてみたら、 気を遣ってばかりで疲れる職場だったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
はは……よく考えてみたら、
気を遣ってばかりで疲れる職場だったんだ。

engSearchText:
You say you can get my job back, but honestly, I'm
not sure if I even want it that badly.
jpnChrName: 君に依頼をしてまで戻りたいかと聞かれると、 分からなくなっちまってな。
jpnSearchText:
君に依頼をしてまで戻りたいかと聞かれると、
分からなくなっちまってな。

engChrName: What was I even thinking? I should be happy to be out, but here I was about to kill myself after losing it.
engSearchText:
What was I even thinking? I should be happy to be
out, but here I was about to kill myself after losing it.
jpnChrName: その程度の話なのに……退職させられた事に クヨクヨして自殺まで考えて……
jpnSearchText:
その程度の話なのに……退職させられた事に
クヨクヨして自殺まで考えて……

engChrName: I have no idea what came over me.
engSearchText: I have no idea what came over me.
jpnChrName: 俺は一体何がしたかったんだかな。
jpnSearchText: 俺は一体何がしたかったんだかな。

engChrName: Hey, things happen. So, what's the plan, then? If you're not gonna try to get your old job back, you've gotta find somethin' else to live for.
engSearchText:
Hey, things happen. So, what's the plan, then?
If you're not gonna try to get your old job back,
you've gotta find somethin' else to live for.
jpnChrName: ハッ、それじゃ自殺も依頼もしないってんなら 今は何がしたい気分なんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、それじゃ自殺も依頼もしないってんなら
今は何がしたい気分なんだよ。

engChrName: I don't know yet, but I don't think I should rush into a new job immediately.
engSearchText:
I don't know yet, but I don't think I should rush into
a new job immediately.

jpnSearchText:
そうだな……とりあえず
転職は急がなくてもいいかもな。

I'll find a hobby, think about what I really want in
life, and THEN I can start searching.
jpnChrName: まずは新しく趣味でも見つけて、 ゆっくりしてから今後を考えるとするさ。
jpnSearchText:
まずは新しく趣味でも見つけて、
ゆっくりしてから今後を考えるとするさ。

engChrName: Yeah, that sounds like a mighty fine idea to me. Good on ya.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that sounds like a mighty fine idea to me.
Good on ya.
jpnChrName: ハッ……ま、それでいいんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……ま、それでいいんじゃねえか。

engChrName: (Let's try givin' him the cold shoulder.)
engSearchText: (Let's try givin' him the cold shoulder.)
jpnChrName: （ここはあえて突き放してみるか……）
jpnSearchText: （ここはあえて突き放してみるか……）

engChrName: You got any idea how much mira it'll cost if you jump? It ain't cheap—I can tell ya that much.
engSearchText:
You got any idea how much mira it'll cost if
you jump? It ain't cheap—I can tell ya that much.
jpnChrName: しかし、飛び込みってのは かなりの損害賠償になるらしいな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、飛び込みってのは
かなりの損害賠償になるらしいな。

engChrName: Succeed or fail, the train company's not gonna be happy about it.
engSearchText:
Succeed or fail, the train company's not gonna be
happy about it.
jpnChrName: ま、アンタが成功しても失敗しても、 鉄道会社に迷惑をかけちまうから当然だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、アンタが成功しても失敗しても、
鉄道会社に迷惑をかけちまうから当然だろうが。

engChrName: ...So? I'll be dead, so it won't affect me.
engSearchText: ...So? I'll be dead, so it won't affect me.
jpnChrName: ……そんな事知らねえし、 死んだら関係無いだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
……そんな事知らねえし、
死んだら関係無いだろうが。

engChrName: Maybe. Or maybe you'll live, and you'll just get a life stay in a hospital bed instead. Wouldn't be the first.
engSearchText:
Maybe. Or maybe you'll live, and you'll just get a life
stay in a hospital bed instead. Wouldn't be the first.
jpnChrName: ああ、万が一失敗しちまった場合は、 生涯入院生活って聞いた事があるな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、万が一失敗しちまった場合は、
生涯入院生活って聞いた事があるな。

engChrName: In that case, you'd get the one-two combo of medical bills and damages owed. Sounds like a living hell to me.
engSearchText:
In that case, you'd get the one-two combo of medical
bills and damages owed. Sounds like a living hell
to me.
jpnChrName: 手に入るのは一生モノの苦痛と、 多額の賠償金と入院費用……悲しい話だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
手に入るのは一生モノの苦痛と、
多額の賠償金と入院費用……悲しい話だぜ。

engChrName: Oh, okay. So I should find some way to kill myself besides jumping in front of a train.
engSearchText:
Oh, okay. So I should find some way to kill myself
besides jumping in front of a train.
jpnChrName: あのな……地下鉄じゃなくて 別の方法ならいいって言うのか？
jpnSearchText:
あのな……地下鉄じゃなくて
別の方法ならいいって言うのか？

engChrName: In that case, just hurry and give me back my gun! Nobody will care if I kill myself with that, right?!
engSearchText:
In that case, just hurry and give me back my gun!
Nobody will care if I kill myself with that, right?!
jpnChrName: それなら拳銃を返してくれよ！ ソイツなら迷惑もかけないだろ！？
jpnSearchText:
それなら拳銃を返してくれよ！
ソイツなら迷惑もかけないだろ！？

engChrName: Sure, that's fine—just be aware that you can still screw up and miss that way. Hurts like a bitch, or so I've heard.
engSearchText:
Sure, that's fine—just be aware that you can still
screw up and miss that way. Hurts like a bitch, or so
I've heard.
jpnChrName: ああ、好きにしな。 拳銃も運が悪いと相当苦しむそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、好きにしな。
拳銃も運が悪いと相当苦しむそうだが。

engChrName: I did NOT need to know that. I figured you were trying to stop me, not give me useless trivia.
engSearchText:
I did NOT need to know that. I figured you were
trying to stop me, not give me useless trivia.
jpnChrName: ま、また余計な事を言って…… 俺を引き留めないんじゃなかったのか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、また余計な事を言って……
俺を引き留めないんじゃなかったのか。

engChrName: If not, do you mind handing over my gun instead and letting me take the easy way out?
engSearchText:
If not, do you mind handing over my gun instead and
letting me take the easy way out?
jpnChrName: いいから早く俺を楽にさせてくれよ！
jpnSearchText: いいから早く俺を楽にさせてくれよ！

engChrName: And that's what I'm tryin' to tell you—suicide ain't the easy way out you thought it was.
engSearchText:
And that's what I'm tryin' to tell you—suicide ain't
the easy way out you thought it was.
jpnChrName: ああ、だから教えてやってんだよ── 自殺は楽な道じゃねえってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だから教えてやってんだよ──
自殺は楽な道じゃねえってな。

engChrName: You're startin' to realize that, too. I can tell everything I've been saying's got you scared shitless.
engSearchText:
You're startin' to realize that, too. I can tell everything
I've been saying's got you scared shitless.
jpnChrName: 現に、俺の話を聞いただけで ビビっちまってるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
現に、俺の話を聞いただけで
ビビっちまってるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Keep talking—it won't change the fact that I don't have any other options left.
engSearchText:
Keep talking—it won't change the fact that I don't
have any other options left.
jpnChrName: ハッ……好き勝手言いやがって。 だがな、俺には他の道が無いんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……好き勝手言いやがって。
だがな、俺には他の道が無いんだよ。

engChrName: Sure you do. Just go right on back to the stall you were at for another drink or fifty.
engSearchText:
Sure you do. Just go right on back to the stall you
were at for another drink or fifty.
jpnChrName: 本当にそうか？　屋台に戻って 好きなだけ飲み直す事も出来るだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
本当にそうか？　屋台に戻って
好きなだけ飲み直す事も出来るだろうが。

engChrName: That sounds a hell of a lot easier than what you're tryin' to do here.
engSearchText:
That sounds a hell of a lot easier than what you're
tryin' to do here.
jpnChrName: そっちの方がよっぽど 楽な道ってヤツだと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
そっちの方がよっぽど
楽な道ってヤツだと思うけどな。

engChrName: Anyway, I suppose I'll get out of your hair. Whatever you decide to do ain't any of my business.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I suppose I'll get out of your hair.
Whatever you decide to do ain't any of my business.
jpnChrName: ま、何度も言ってるが好きにすればいいさ。 どうせ俺にとっては他人事だ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、何度も言ってるが好きにすればいいさ。
どうせ俺にとっては他人事だ。

engChrName: Goddess above. I don't even know why I took losing my job this badly to begin with.
engSearchText:
Goddess above. I don't even know why I took losing
my job this badly to begin with.
jpnChrName: はぁ……分からなくなっちまったよ。 どうして俺はムキになってんだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……分からなくなっちまったよ。
どうして俺はムキになってんだろうな。

engChrName: When it happened, I just randomly decided it'd be easier to die than to go through it all.
engSearchText:
When it happened, I just randomly decided it'd be
easier to die than to go through it all.
jpnChrName: 生きてたって仕方ない…… そう思って死んで楽になろうと思ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
生きてたって仕方ない……
そう思って死んで楽になろうと思ってたが。

engChrName: All I wanted was to run away from a terrible situation—not to actually die.
engSearchText:
All I wanted was to run away from a terrible
situation—not to actually die.
jpnChrName: 要は、辛い現実から逃げたいだけ…… なにも死にたい訳じゃねえって事か。
jpnSearchText:
要は、辛い現実から逃げたいだけ……
なにも死にたい訳じゃねえって事か。

engChrName: *sigh* Yeah, no way am I doing it now. Maybe you're right about there being an easier way out of this.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Yeah, no way am I doing it now. Maybe you're
right about there being an easier way out of this.
jpnChrName: あーあ、なんか白けて来ちまったなぁ…… アンタの言う通り、他の楽な道を探すのもアリかもな。
jpnSearchText:
あーあ、なんか白けて来ちまったなぁ……
アンタの言う通り、他の楽な道を探すのもアリかもな。

engChrName: Heh. That's the spirit.
engSearchText: Heh. That's the spirit.
jpnChrName: ハッ……そうかよ。 まあそれでいいんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……そうかよ。
まあそれでいいんじゃねえか。

engChrName: I never would've guessed leaving that bag behind would save my life.
engSearchText:
I never would've guessed leaving that bag behind
would save my life.
jpnChrName: そういえば……元を辿れば俺の荷物を 届けに来てくれたんだったよな。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……元を辿れば俺の荷物を
届けに来てくれたんだったよな。

engChrName: I guess it did. While I'm still thinking about it, here you go.
engSearchText:
I guess it did. While I'm still thinking about it, here
you go.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの物騒なケーキの箱だな。 勿論返してやるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの物騒なケーキの箱だな。
勿論返してやるぜ。

engChrName: Van handed the man his bag.
engSearchText: Van handed the man his bag.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはスーツの男性に ケーキの箱に入った拳銃を渡した。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはスーツの男性に
ケーキの箱に入った拳銃を渡した。

engChrName: Haha... I went through so much trouble to get this thing, but I can't even imagine using it now.
engSearchText:
Haha... I went through so much trouble to get this
thing, but I can't even imagine using it now.
jpnChrName: はは……苦労して手に入れた拳銃だが。 今思えば俺は血迷ってたんだな。
jpnSearchText:
はは……苦労して手に入れた拳銃だが。
今思えば俺は血迷ってたんだな。

engChrName: I think you said that stall owner was the one who asked you to find me?
engSearchText:
I think you said that stall owner was the one who
asked you to find me?
jpnChrName: それと……アンタは確か 店主の依頼で来たって言ってたよな？
jpnSearchText:
それと……アンタは確か
店主の依頼で来たって言ってたよな？

engChrName: The least I can do is pay you on her behalf.
engSearchText: The least I can do is pay you on her behalf.
jpnChrName: その依頼料は俺が払わせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: その依頼料は俺が払わせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: It was more than worth it getting the chance to talk to you.
engSearchText:
It was more than worth it getting the chance to talk
to you.
jpnChrName: アンタと話してる内に 色々気付かされちまったからな。
jpnSearchText:
アンタと話してる内に
色々気付かされちまったからな。

engChrName: Works for me. I don't care who does it as long as I get paid. I'll let her know you settled the bill.
engSearchText:
Works for me. I don't care who does it as long as I
get paid. I'll let her know you settled the bill.
jpnChrName: ま、支払ってくれるなら誰でも構わねえよ。 店主には俺から伝えておくさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、支払ってくれるなら誰でも構わねえよ。
店主には俺から伝えておくさ。

engChrName: I'd appreciate it, thanks.
engSearchText: I'd appreciate it, thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼む。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よろしく頼む。

engChrName: Well, I'd best head on home for today.
engSearchText: Well, I'd best head on home for today.
jpnChrName: さてと……それじゃあ俺は、 今日の所は家に帰る事にするよ。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……それじゃあ俺は、
今日の所は家に帰る事にするよ。

engChrName: I've done enough drinking for one night, and it'd be better to cool my head and do some thinking.
engSearchText:
I've done enough drinking for one night, and it'd be
better to cool my head and do some thinking.
jpnChrName: 飲み過ぎちまったし、 頭を冷やして色々考えたいしな。
jpnSearchText:
飲み過ぎちまったし、
頭を冷やして色々考えたいしな。

engChrName: You're a lifesaver, young man—literally. I'll never forget the debt I owe you.
engSearchText:
You're a lifesaver, young man—literally. I'll never
forget the debt I owe you.
jpnChrName: ……世話になったな、若いの。 アンタへの恩は忘れないぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……世話になったな、若いの。
アンタへの恩は忘れないぜ。

engChrName: The next train arrived soon after, and Van made sure the man safely boarded it.
engSearchText:
The next train arrived soon after, and Van made sure
the man safely boarded it.
jpnChrName: その後ヴァンは、間もなく到着した 列車に乗り込むスーツの男性を見送り──
jpnSearchText:
その後ヴァンは、間もなく到着した
列車に乗り込むスーツの男性を見送り──

engChrName: Afterward, he finished up the job by calling Shino with the details of what had happened.
engSearchText:
Afterward, he finished up the job by calling Shino
with the details of what had happened.
jpnChrName: 通信でシノに依頼の顛末を伝え、 依頼を遂げるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
通信でシノに依頼の顛末を伝え、
依頼を遂げるのだった。

engChrName: Quest What Once Was Lost completed!
engSearchText: Quest What Once Was Lost completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【物騒な忘れ物の返却】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>物騒な忘れ物の返却<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Yo. We're playin' a puzzle game right now.
engSearchText: Yo. We're playin' a puzzle game right now.
jpnChrName: 俺達は謎解きゲームに参加してるモンなんだが。
jpnSearchText: 俺達は謎解きゲームに参加してるモンなんだが。

engChrName: I take it you're the one watchin' over the second key?
engSearchText: I take it you're the one watchin' over the second key?
jpnChrName: アンタが二つ目の鍵を持ってる 見守り手ってヤツで合ってるか？
jpnSearchText:
アンタが二つ目の鍵を持ってる
見守り手ってヤツで合ってるか？

engChrName: Heh. Very astute.
engSearchText: Heh. Very astute.
jpnChrName: クク……さては あの女主人から話を聞いて来たのか？
jpnSearchText:
クク……さては
あの女主人から話を聞いて来たのか？

engChrName: You'd be correct! Before you stands the supervisor of the Kingdom of Edith's underground mine!
engSearchText:
You'd be correct! Before you stands the supervisor of
the Kingdom of Edith's underground mine!
jpnChrName: そうさ、俺こそがイーディス王国の 地下採掘場の責任者！
jpnSearchText:
そうさ、俺こそがイーディス王国の
地下採掘場の責任者！

engChrName: With the subterranean tunnels known only to me, whisking away the princess was child's play.
engSearchText:
With the subterranean tunnels known only to me,
whisking away the princess was child's play.
jpnChrName: 地下の抜け道を使えば 姫の誘拐なんて簡単なモンだったさ。
jpnSearchText:
地下の抜け道を使えば
姫の誘拐なんて簡単なモンだったさ。

engChrName: (Looks like he's really gotten into this...)
engSearchText: (Looks like he's really gotten into this...)
jpnChrName: （こいつもまた随分とノリノリだな……）
jpnSearchText: （こいつもまた随分とノリノリだな……）

engChrName: So you were the one who kidnapped her, then?
engSearchText: So you were the one who kidnapped her, then?
jpnChrName: それでは、貴方が姫の誘拐の 実行犯だったという訳ですか。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、貴方が姫の誘拐の
実行犯だったという訳ですか。

engChrName: So you're the one who kidnapped her, then?
engSearchText: So you're the one who kidnapped her, then?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、貴方が姫の誘拐の 実行犯だったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、貴方が姫の誘拐の
実行犯だったんですね。

engChrName: So you're the one who actually nabbed her.
engSearchText: So you're the one who actually nabbed her.
jpnChrName: つう事は、お前が姫の誘拐の 実行犯だったつう訳か。
jpnSearchText:
つう事は、お前が姫の誘拐の
実行犯だったつう訳か。

engChrName: In one sense, yes. I did little more than carry her off to her prison, however.
engSearchText:
In one sense, yes. I did little more than carry her off
to her prison, however.
jpnChrName: クク、そうとも言えるが…… 俺は幽閉場所まで運んでやっただけの運搬係さ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、そうとも言えるが……
俺は幽閉場所まで運んでやっただけの運搬係さ。

engChrName: It was someone else who hatched the plot to take her there.
engSearchText:
It was someone else who hatched the plot to take
her there.
jpnChrName: 幽閉を企てた真犯人は別にいるぜ。
jpnSearchText: 幽閉を企てた真犯人は別にいるぜ。

engChrName: I assume you want to know who, but you'll get nothing more from me. If you desire the truth, it lies beyond the next mystery.
engSearchText:
I assume you want to know who, but you'll get
nothing more from me. If you desire the truth, it lies
beyond the next mystery.
jpnChrName: 真相が知りたければ この謎でも解いてみる事だな。
jpnSearchText:
真相が知りたければ
この謎でも解いてみる事だな。

engChrName: Here's the second key, as a reward for your cunning.
engSearchText: Here's the second key, as a reward for your cunning.
jpnChrName: ついでに二つ目の鍵もお前たちにくれてやる。
jpnSearchText: ついでに二つ目の鍵もお前たちにくれてやる。

engChrName: Van received the second key!
engSearchText: Van received the second key!
jpnChrName: ヴァンは『第二の鍵』を手に入れた！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンは『第二の鍵』を手に入れた！

engChrName: Jumpin' straight to the next one, huh? Let's see...
engSearchText: Jumpin' straight to the next one, huh? Let's see...
jpnChrName: 早速次の謎解きって訳だな。 どれ……？
jpnSearchText:
早速次の謎解きって訳だな。
どれ……？

engChrName: The final key is in the Tyrell District. The ever-resourceful guide of the theater has it on their person.
engSearchText:
The final key is in the Tyrell District.
The ever-resourceful guide of the theater has it on
their person.
jpnChrName: 最後の鍵はタイレル領に。 機知に富む劇場の案内人が隠し持っている。
jpnSearchText:
最後の鍵はタイレル領に。
機知に富む劇場の案内人が隠し持っている。

engChrName: So this one's in Tyrell.
engSearchText: So this one's in Tyrell.
jpnChrName: お、今度はタイレルか。
jpnSearchText: お、今度はタイレルか。

engChrName: 'The ever-resourceful guide of the theater'? Maybe it's some kind of code.
engSearchText:
'The ever-resourceful guide of the theater'? Maybe it's
some kind of code.
jpnChrName: 機知に富む劇場の案内人というと…… 言葉を言い換えればなにか分かりそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
機知に富む劇場の案内人というと……
言葉を言い換えればなにか分かりそうですね。

engChrName: 'The ever-resourceful guide of the theater'? I...think I kind of get it. Maybe?
engSearchText:
'The ever-resourceful guide of the theater'? I...think I
kind of get it. Maybe?
jpnChrName: 機知に富む劇場の案内人ですか。 分かるような分からないような……？
jpnSearchText:
機知に富む劇場の案内人ですか。
分かるような分からないような……？

engChrName: 'The ever-resourceful guide of the theater'? Another dumb riddle, I'm guessing.
engSearchText:
'The ever-resourceful guide of the theater'?
Another dumb riddle, I'm guessing.
jpnChrName: 機知に富む劇場の案内人ねぇ。 こいつもまた言葉遊びって所か。
jpnSearchText:
機知に富む劇場の案内人ねぇ。
こいつもまた言葉遊びって所か。

engChrName: At this point, I'm kinda curious about the ending, honestly.
engSearchText:
At this point, I'm kinda curious about the
ending, honestly.
jpnChrName: ああ、ここまで来たら 最後まで付き合ってやろうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ここまで来たら
最後まで付き合ってやろうじゃねえか。

engChrName: Let's get a move on.
engSearchText: Let's get a move on.
jpnChrName: 早速行ってみるとするかね。
jpnSearchText: 早速行ってみるとするかね。

engChrName: So next up is...Old Town, right? What'll we find there?
engSearchText:
So next up is...Old Town, right? What'll we
find there?
jpnChrName: ええと、今度は八区の旧市街だっけ。 ここには何があるの？
jpnSearchText:
ええと、今度は八区の旧市街だっけ。
ここには何があるの？

engChrName: Oh, just the perfect place to end our tour. That's all.
engSearchText: Oh, just the perfect place to end our tour. That's all.
jpnChrName: シメに相応しい所に 連れてってやろうと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
シメに相応しい所に
連れてってやろうと思ってな。

engChrName: Long as you don't let the chef's face spook ya, at least.
engSearchText: Long as you don't let the chef's face spook ya, at least.
jpnChrName: おやっさんの顔が怖いのが玉にキズだが。
jpnSearchText: おやっさんの顔が怖いのが玉にキズだが。

engChrName: I assume you mean Montmart? I'll look forward to that—
engSearchText:
I assume you mean Montmart? I'll look forward to
that—
jpnChrName: ああ、あのビストロね。 ふふ、せっかくだから私も──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あのビストロね。
ふふ、せっかくだから私も──

engChrName: Ah, crap.
engSearchText: Ah, crap.
jpnChrName: おっと……
jpnSearchText: おっと……

engChrName: This happens from time to time. The lights down here haven't been replaced in a while.
engSearchText:
This happens from time to time. The lights down
here haven't been replaced in a while.
jpnChrName: 導力灯の老朽化か。 たまにあるんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
導力灯の老朽化か。
たまにあるんだよな。

engChrName: The both of you are unharmed, ri—
engSearchText: The both of you are unharmed, ri—
jpnChrName: 二人とも大丈夫──
jpnSearchText: 二人とも大丈夫──

engChrName: Don't worry, it's okay! No one's here to hurt you!
engSearchText: Don't worry, it's okay! No one's here to hurt you!
jpnChrName: もう大丈夫だから、 悪い奴はいないから……！
jpnSearchText:
もう大丈夫だから、
悪い奴はいないから……！

engChrName: Is this...what I think it is?
engSearchText: Is this...what I think it is?
jpnChrName: これは……
jpnSearchText: これは……

engChrName: Sh-She still gets like this whenever she's in dark, cramped places.
engSearchText:
Sh-She still gets like this whenever she's in dark,
cramped places.
jpnChrName: い、今でも狭くて暗い所にいると、 こうなるんだ……
jpnSearchText:
い、今でも狭くて暗い所にいると、
こうなるんだ……

engChrName: It must remind her of where we were trapped.
engSearchText: It must remind her of where we were trapped.
jpnChrName: あの時、閉じ込められていた 場所のことを思い出すから……
jpnSearchText:
あの時、閉じ込められていた
場所のことを思い出すから……

engChrName: Sorry. I don't think she's gonna be able to move anytime soon.
engSearchText:
Sorry. I don't think she's gonna be able to move
anytime soon.
jpnChrName: ごめん、妹がこうなったら、 しばらくは動けないと思う……
jpnSearchText:
ごめん、妹がこうなったら、
しばらくは動けないと思う……

engChrName: (I shouldn't be surprised her emotional scars run so deep...)
engSearchText:
(I shouldn't be surprised her emotional scars run
so deep...)
jpnChrName: （やはり心の傷は   そう簡単には消えたりしない……）
jpnSearchText:
（やはり心の傷は
そう簡単には消えたりしない……）

engChrName: (Can't I do anything to help her? Anything at all?!)
engSearchText: (Can't I do anything to help her? Anything at all?!)
jpnChrName: （こんな時に何も出来ないだなんて、   私は………）
jpnSearchText:
（こんな時に何も出来ないだなんて、
私は………）

engChrName: Upsy-daisy.
engSearchText: Upsy-daisy.
jpnChrName: ほらよっと──
jpnSearchText: ほらよっと──

engChrName: Van lifted the girl up onto his shoulders.
engSearchText: Van lifted the girl up onto his shoulders.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは少女を肩車した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンは少女を肩車した。

engChrName: H-Huh?
engSearchText: H-Huh?
jpnChrName: お、お兄さん？
jpnSearchText: お、お兄さん？

engChrName: V-Van? What are you—?
engSearchText: V-Van? What are you—?
jpnChrName: ちょっとヴァン、何を──
jpnSearchText: ちょっとヴァン、何を──

engChrName: Let's get out of here!
engSearchText: Let's get out of here!
jpnChrName: お前らもついて来い！
jpnSearchText: お前らもついて来い！

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Yo. Sorry for the wait.
engSearchText: Yo. Sorry for the wait.
jpnChrName: よう、待たせちまったな。
jpnSearchText: よう、待たせちまったな。

engChrName: Don't worry about it—I just got here myself. Thanks for coming.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about it—I just got here myself.
Thanks for coming.
jpnChrName: ううん、わたしも今来たところ。 頼みに応じてくれてサンクス。
jpnSearchText:
ううん、わたしも今来たところ。
頼みに応じてくれてサンクス。

engChrName: Think nothin' of it. Seems this has to do with one of my part-timers, so I figured I might as well.
engSearchText:
Think nothin' of it. Seems this has to do with one of
my part-timers, so I figured I might as well.
jpnChrName: まあ、ウチのバイトの一人も 関わっている一件みたいだからな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ウチのバイトの一人も
関わっている一件みたいだからな。

engChrName: You want me to help out with a memento of the Flameeater's, right?
engSearchText:
You want me to help out with a memento of the
Flameeater's, right?
jpnChrName: 《火喰鳥》の遺品がらみの話だったか。
jpnSearchText: 《火喰鳥》の遺品がらみの話だったか。

engChrName: Yep. I want to fix up the custom rifle that Aida used to use.
engSearchText:
Yep. I want to fix up the custom rifle that Aida used
to use.
jpnChrName: ん──アイーダが使っていた、 今は壊れてしまったカスタムライフル。
jpnSearchText:
ん──アイーダが使っていた、
今は壊れてしまったカスタムライフル。

engChrName: Seems like you've heard about it already.
engSearchText: Seems like you've heard about it already.
jpnChrName: それを修理することになってね。 ヴァンも話は聞いてるみたいだね？
jpnSearchText:
それを修理することになってね。
ヴァンも話は聞いてるみたいだね？

engChrName: Sure have. We tried to get it repaired before, but they told us it wasn't really feasible.
engSearchText:
Sure have. We tried to get it repaired before, but they
told us it wasn't really feasible.
jpnChrName: ああ──前に修理をしようとした時は 結局難しいって話になったが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──前に修理をしようとした時は
結局難しいって話になったが。

engChrName: Feri managed to recover it after the incident in Creil. The one back in September, I mean.
engSearchText:
Feri managed to recover it after the incident in Creil.
The one back in September, I mean.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の一件のあと、 フェリが回収してくれていたものでね。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の一件のあと、
フェリが回収してくれていたものでね。

engChrName: I assume the two of you found a way to fix it?
engSearchText: I assume the two of you found a way to fix it?
jpnChrName: それをあいつと協力して ようやく修理する事になったわけか。
jpnSearchText:
それをあいつと協力して
ようやく修理する事になったわけか。

engChrName: Bingo. We learned what parts we'd need to repair it, so all that's left is to actually get them.
engSearchText:
Bingo. We learned what parts we'd need to repair it,
so all that's left is to actually get them.
jpnChrName: 修理に必要になりそうな、 部品一式の情報をようやく手に入れてね。
jpnSearchText:
修理に必要になりそうな、
部品一式の情報をようやく手に入れてね。

engChrName: It's been bothering me ever since I learned it was damaged, so I'm glad I can finally do something.
engSearchText:
It's been bothering me ever since I learned it was
damaged, so I'm glad I can finally do something.
jpnChrName: ライフルの事はわたしとしても ずっと気がかりだったから。
jpnSearchText:
ライフルの事はわたしとしても
ずっと気がかりだったから。

engChrName: I figure things will get really busy once the festival starts, so I want to get it taken care of before then.
engSearchText:
I figure things will get really busy once the festival
starts, so I want to get it taken care of before then.
jpnChrName: 記念祭で忙しくなる前に なんとか片付けておきたくて。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭で忙しくなる前に
なんとか片付けておきたくて。

engChrName: Feri's working on the stuff that can be gathered above ground...
engSearchText:
Feri's working on the stuff that can be gathered
above ground...
jpnChrName: ──フェリには今、地上で手に入る部品や 必要な工具を集めてもらっている。
jpnSearchText:
──フェリには今、地上で手に入る部品や
必要な工具を集めてもらっている。

engChrName: While you're gonna be gettin' the underground stuff—from the Blacklight District, in other words.
engSearchText:
While you're gonna be gettin' the underground
stuff—from the Blacklight District, in other words.
jpnChrName: そしてお前さんは黒芒街で 地上では手に入らないレアパーツを探す……
jpnSearchText:
そしてお前さんは黒芒街で
地上では手に入らないレアパーツを探す……

engChrName: And you want me to show you around the place.
engSearchText: And you want me to show you around the place.
jpnChrName: そのために俺に 黒芒街の案内を頼みたいってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
そのために俺に
黒芒街の案内を頼みたいってわけか。

engChrName: Exactly. I've heard that nose of yours is really impressive—so impressive that even Zin relies on it.
engSearchText:
Exactly. I've heard that nose of yours is really
impressive—so impressive that even Zin relies on it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ジンが頼る程度には 顔が利くって聞いたから。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ジンが頼る程度には
顔が利くって聞いたから。

engChrName: How about it? You up for being my guide?
engSearchText: How about it? You up for being my guide?
jpnChrName: エスコート、お願いできるかな？
jpnSearchText: エスコート、お願いできるかな？

engChrName: Sure, why not? Couldn't hurt puttin' you in my debt more.
engSearchText:
Sure, why not? Couldn't hurt puttin' you in my
debt more.
jpnChrName: まあ、滅多にない遊撃士からの依頼だ。 貸しを作る意味でも手伝ってやるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、滅多にない遊撃士からの依頼だ。
貸しを作る意味でも手伝ってやるぜ。

engChrName: I'd be helpin' one of my part-timers move on, too. Sounds like a win-win to me.
engSearchText:
I'd be helpin' one of my part-timers move on, too.
Sounds like a win-win to me.
jpnChrName: 他でもない、ウチのバイトの 区切りの一つにもなりそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
他でもない、ウチのバイトの
区切りの一つにもなりそうだしな。

engChrName: Thanks. Let's get moving, then.
engSearchText: Thanks. Let's get moving, then.
jpnChrName: ふふ、助かる。 それじゃさっそく入ろうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、助かる。
それじゃさっそく入ろうか。
